title: Collaborative Learning Design for Implementing Computer Science Teamwork

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Programming Skills and Understanding of the Software Development Process
context.additional_context: Mobile-based microlearning environment for job-seeking individuals to enhance workplace collaboration competencies

learning_goals: Learners can proceed with projects by applying agile team processes (Scrum/Kanban) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can complete a 4-week team assignment using collaboration tools (Jira, GitHub, Slack) and submit a final report.
Learners can identify improvement points for peer code quality with over 70% accuracy through peer review.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
